audiocommunication: Two-way audio with built-in microphone and speaker
localstorage: MicroSD/SDHC card slot (supports local storage of snapshots and video recordings)
optionalaccessory: Compro WL160 USB Wireless b/g/n adapter
minimumillumination: IR mode: 0 lux, with 3 built-in IR LEDs in darkness (effective up to 6m)
protocols: TCP/IP, HTTP, UDP, FTP, ICMP, ARP, DHCP, NTP, DDNS, UPnP, RTP, RTSP, RTCP, SMTP, IGMP, 3GPP, IPv4
